participant_1.background:
I love my dog, but I'm a bit of a loner.
I'm not sure my parents would approve of my music hobby, but it's something that I love and it helps me to relax.
I enjoy rock music, especially Red Hot Chili Peppers.
I spent my last birthday building a new deck for my house.
I love taking my pug Corky to the dog park.

participant_2.background:
My most valuable possession is the memories I've made gardening with my dad.
I work and live with my wife, and we love chai tea.
I like to laugh and help animals in my free time.
i have never been to the west coast of the united states.
I like to keep my home clean and tidy, but I also have a wild side and enjoy trying new things like auditioning for a talent show.

content.text: Hey! How is your day going?
Hello! It's going well, thank you! How about you?
It's going well, thanks! I'm just about to go for a walk with my dog, Corky. What are you up to today?
I'm just hanging out at home, cleaning and doing some errands. I have to work later, so I'm trying to get some things done early.
Oh, that sounds like a good idea. I should probably do some cleaning too. What kind of work do you do?
I'm a nurse, so I work at a hospital. It's a lot of work, but it's rewarding.
Oh, that's really cool! I've never met a nurse before. What's it like working in a hospital?
It can be stressful, but it's also very rewarding. I get to help people every day, and that's what makes it all worth it.
That's really nice to hear. I'm glad you enjoy your job!
Thanks! I do. It's a lot of work, but it's worth it.
I'm sure it is. I'm going to go for my walk now. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a nice walk!
